name: Fractal Gallery VR
detailed_description:
About

Gallery of fractals in virtual reality.
A cozy place in which you can relax from everyday life looking at the beauty of mathematics.

What's inside

- 100 static images of fractals.
- 30 dynamic images of fractals.
- Hidden secrets.
- Meditative soundtrack.

The gallery is constantly changing, so you can always find something new.

Let the Fractal Gallery become a part of your VR-universe.

Support and updates

I plan to actively support this project after launch. There are some interesting ideas that I plan to implement. Also over time, I plan to add new content: new fractals, environmental details, objects, and hidden secrets.
The project is based on UE4. Therefore, I plan to add support for new VR devices and improve the graphics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
